price: „Не рекох ли ја теби“, рече он, „да ти, заиста, нећеш моћи да се стрпиш са мном.“
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
